category.name: Interface.Thin Client.Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEReplaceAssemblyInContext_AlignProperties
preference.preference_description: Enables the alignment of properties on Items and Revisions created in Manufacturing BOM (MBOM), during a replace assembly with any item type operation. The following formats are allowed (the character ':' is the separator in each of them): * "Item:[InternalEBOMItemType,InternalMBOMItemType:(EBOMInternalPropertyName,MBOMInternalPropertyName)+]" (e.g. "Item:Item,Document:fnd0is_monolithic,fnd0is_monolithic"): The EBOM and MBOM Items for which the underlying property types match, will have their values aligned. * "Revision:[InternalEBOMItemType,InternalMBOMItemType:(EBOMInternalPropertyName,MBOMInternalPropertyName)+]" (e.g. "Revision:ItemRevision,DocumentRevision:ebomRevProp,mbomRevProp"): The EBOM and MBOM Item Revisions for which the underlying property types match, will have their values aligned.
